name: The Temple Curse
overview: Released as part of "Commodore Pro-Pak" game pack and is the 2nd part of "Nick Hardy Adventures" trilogy. In the steaming tropics of South America, fearless Nick Hardy is hot on the trail of a hidden treasure that could make him (and the entire state of Michigan) very comfortable for life. He needs your help. But be careful - these Inca's don't mess around when it comes to curses!
